item.title: Vanessa & Luna Lyrics
item.description:
Vanessa & Luna - Keeping it real together.
Vanessa & Luna - No one will get in our way!

Cause we are alone now and totally free,
to be whatever we want to be,
and we know that we will survive,
cause we've got nothing to lose.

The world is a weird place.
Life is a heart beat.
People are different,
yet always the same.

Vanessa & Luna... We're coming your way.
Vanessa & Luna... But don't think we'll stay.

Cause we're on a road trip,
to figure me out.
To open my doors,
and cast away doubt.
And if we don't make it,
'll be alright.
Cause we chose to live life,
and put up a fight!

Vanessa & Luna

One day I will record this. The melody is set. However I have no other music. It's tough to write music!
item.dc:creator: Luna Umbra

item.title: Watch me play my violin and be goofy
item.dc:creator: Luna Umbra

item.title: Surrender Rain
item.description: I wrote this song in 2012 and 2013. It was my attempt at expressing my acceptance of the story I must live.
item.dc:creator: Luna Umbra

item.title: This Moment In Mine
item.description:
~2012. My first attempt at expressing the emotions behind processing my gender dysphoria. Each section took a couple of months to write. So each movement chronicles another chapter of my progress through accepting what I am.

I also have another recording from 4 years ago. Check it out here
item.dc:creator: Luna Umbra

item.title: Cabochon
item.description: I wrote this song in 2012 and edited as recently as a few months ago to practice playing more complicated music on the piano.
item.dc:creator: Luna Umbra
